name: HS 533 Hair Serum
description: Advanced hair serum formulated to nourish and strengthen hair follicles while promoting healthy hair growth and shine.
howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops to clean, damp hair. Massage gently into scalp and hair lengths. Do not rinse. Use daily for best results.
warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if irritation occurs.

name: Nilkilz Shampoo
description: Gentle cleansing shampoo that removes impurities while maintaining natural hair moisture and scalp health.
howToUse: Wet hair thoroughly. Apply shampoo to scalp and hair, lather gently. Rinse completely with warm water. Repeat if necessary.
warnings: Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.

name: Frecyy Facewash
description: Refreshing facial cleanser designed to remove makeup, dirt, and excess oil while leaving skin soft and balanced.
howToUse: Apply to wet face and neck. Massage gently in circular motions for 30 seconds. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Use morning and evening.
warnings: For external use only. Perform patch test before first use. Discontinue if redness or irritation develops.

name: Hydrapiel Lotion
description: Intensive moisturizing lotion that provides long-lasting hydration and helps restore skin's natural barrier function.
howToUse: Apply generously to clean skin. Massage in upward circular motions until fully absorbed. Use twice daily or as needed.
warnings: For external use only. Keep away from children. Store in a cool, dry place.

name: Masha Barrier Repair Cream
description: Intensive repair cream specially formulated to restore damaged skin barrier and provide deep nourishment for compromised skin.
howToUse: Apply thin layer to clean face and neck in the evening. Allow to absorb completely. Start with 2-3 times per week, gradually increase frequency.
warnings: Use sunscreen during the day when using this product. May cause initial sensitivity. Pregnant or nursing women should consult physician before use.
